item.description:
let's try this again- this date is the soonest we could re schedule from the last one I had to cancel a few weeks ago.
Fingers crossed we're all healthy and happy on the 10th!! I hope at least the SAME people can come, and more!! If you never have been to a euchre meet up yet, why not?? It's on a Sat, bring your own drinks- we have water, milk, some hard booze for making some drinks... we'll play until our hearts are content, so if it's a further drive for some of you, just know your drive will be worth it (we hope)...come along for some EUCHRE fun!!
See you soon, Mindy

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: October Euchre
